languages.text: Офицеры скомандовали залп, и один из огнеметов превратился в пылающий смерч, а его владелец — в кричащий факел. Брызги от взорвавшегося топливного бака залили корабельную переборку и сильно повредили соседний трюм, а многие пустотники получили сильнейшие ожоги. От сгоревших продуктов же не осталось даже пепла, и люди решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

traits.locale_text: Офицеры скомандовали залп, и один из огнеметов превратился в пылающий смерч, а его владелец — в кричащий факел. Брызги от взорвавшегося топливного бака залили корабельную переборку и сильно повредили соседний трюм, а многие пустотники получили сильнейшие ожоги. От сгоревших продуктов же не осталось даже пепла, и люди решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

languages.text: The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.
languages.original_text: Офицеры скомандовали залп, и один из огнеметов превратился в пылающий смерч, а его владелец — в кричащий факел. Брызги от взорвавшегося топливного бака залили корабельную переборку и сильно повредили соседний трюм, а многие пустотники получили сильнейшие ожоги. От сгоревших продуктов же не осталось даже пепла, и люди решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

traits.locale_text: The officers commanded a salvo, and one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind that turned its owner into a screaming torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank poured over the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The burned victuals vanished without leaving behind even a pinch of ash, so the people decided the worms had been a deception and nothing more.

The officers commanded a salvo, and one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind that turned its owner into a screaming torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank poured over the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The burned victuals vanished without leaving behind even a pinch of ash, so the people decided the worms had been a deception and nothing more.

The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

languages.text: 军官们命令士兵们销毁被污染的食物。在点火的过程中，其中一个火焰喷射器忽然失控，爆发出来的烈焰将操作员变成了惨叫连连的火把。燃料箱发生了爆炸，溢出的油浸透了舱壁，火势蔓延。相邻的货舱也陷入了火海之中，许多住在其中的船员被活活烧死，被烧焦的粮食却消失得无影无踪，连一丝灰烬都没有留下。因此，绝大部分船员认为，先前的污染仅仅是幻觉而已。
languages.original_text: The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: 军官们命令士兵们销毁被污染的食物。在点火的过程中，其中一个火焰喷射器忽然失控，爆发出来的烈焰将操作员变成了惨叫连连的火把。燃料箱发生了爆炸，溢出的油浸透了舱壁，火势蔓延。相邻的货舱也陷入了火海之中，许多住在其中的船员被活活烧死，被烧焦的粮食却消失得无影无踪，连一丝灰烬都没有留下。因此，绝大部分船员认为，先前的污染仅仅是幻觉而已。

languages.text: Los oficiales ordenaron a los hombres que lanzaran una salva. Al encenderse, uno de los lanzallamas desató un torbellino abrasador, convirtiendo a su portador en una antorcha aullante. El vertido del tanque de combustible que explotó empapó el muro de la nave y dañó gravemente la bodega adyacente, quemando a muchos de los soldados del vacío que se encontraban allí. Los depósitos calcinados desaparecieron sin dejar rastro de ceniza, por lo que la mayoría decidió que los gusanos no habían sido más que una ilusión.
languages.original_text: The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales ordenaron a los hombres que lanzaran una salva. Al encenderse, uno de los lanzallamas desató un torbellino abrasador, convirtiendo a su portador en una antorcha aullante. El vertido del tanque de combustible que explotó empapó el muro de la nave y dañó gravemente la bodega adyacente, quemando a muchos de los soldados del vacío que se encontraban allí. Los depósitos calcinados desaparecieron sin dejar rastro de ceniza, por lo que la mayoría decidió que los gusanos no habían sido más que una ilusión.

languages.text: 士官達は部下に一斉射撃を命じた。点火すると、ひとつの火炎放射器が炎と共に旋風を巻き起こし、持ち主を泣き叫ぶ人間松明に変える。爆発した燃料タンクから流れ出たものが船の壁を濡らし、隣接する貨物室に深刻な被害をもたらして、そこに住むヴォイズマンの多くを火だるまにした。焼け焦げた貯蔵品が灰の残りカスもなく消えたことから、ほとんどの人が<歪み>は、ただの幻想だろうと判断した。
languages.original_text: The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: 士官達は部下に一斉射撃を命じた。点火すると、ひとつの火炎放射器が炎と共に旋風を巻き起こし、持ち主を泣き叫ぶ人間松明に変える。爆発した燃料タンクから流れ出たものが船の壁を濡らし、隣接する貨物室に深刻な被害をもたらして、そこに住むヴォイズマンの多くを火だるまにした。焼け焦げた貯蔵品が灰の残りカスもなく消えたことから、ほとんどの人が<歪み>は、ただの幻想だろうと判断した。

languages.text: Dès la première salve de feu ordonnée par les officiers, un des lance-flammes déclenche un tourbillon ardent, transformant son propriétaire en une torche hurlante. Le réservoir explose, répandant du carburant sur la cloison et endommageant gravement la cale adjacente, incinérant au passage un grand nombre des cosmomarins qui y résident. Les réserves calcinées ont disparu sans laisser de traces, et la plupart des membres d'équipage pensent désormais que les larves n'étaient qu'une simple illusion.
languages.original_text: The officers ordered the men to unleash a salvo. Upon ignition, one of the flame throwers unleashed a blazing whirlwind, turning its owner into a wailing torch. The spill from the exploded fuel tank drenched the ship's bulkhead and severely damaged the adjacent hold, burning many of the resident voidsmen. The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: Dès la première salve de feu ordonnée par les officiers, un des lance-flammes déclenche un tourbillon ardent, transformant son propriétaire en une torche hurlante. Le réservoir explose, répandant du carburant sur la cloison et endommageant gravement la cale adjacente, incinérant au passage un grand nombre des cosmomarins qui y résident. Les réserves calcinées ont disparu sans laisser de traces, et la plupart des membres d'équipage pensent désormais que les larves n'étaient qu'une simple illusion.

languages.text: Die Offiziere befehlen den Männern, eine Salve abzufeuern. Einer der Flammenwerfer löst einen feurigen Wirbelwind aus, der den Besitzer der Waffe in eine kreischende Fackel verwandelt. Der Brennstoff aus dem explodierten Tank des Flammenwerfers tränkt das Schott des Schiffs und sorgt in den benachbarten Wohnquartieren für schwere Schäden. Viele der dort lebenden Raumfahrer erleiden Verbrennungen. Die verbrannten Vorräte verschwinden, ohne dass die kleinste Spur Arsche zurückbleibt. Die meisten sind sich daher einig, dass die Würmer nur eine Illusion waren.

The scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash, as such most everyone decided the worms had been nothing more than an illusion.
